info.title: Content Understanding
info.description: The Content Understanding service extracts content and fields from multimodal input.

AzureKey.description: Key-based authentication using the access key of the Azure resource.
AzureKey.name: Ocp-Apim-Subscription-Key

EntraIdToken.description: Microsoft Entra ID OAuth2 authentication using an access token.

get.description: Get the result of an analysis operation.

parameters.name: operationId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the operation.

x-ms-error-code.description: String error code indicating what went wrong.

delete.description: Mark the result of an analysis operation for deletion.

get.description: Get the status of an analyzer creation operation.

parameters.name: analyzerId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the analyzer.

parameters.name: operationId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the operation.

x-ms-error-code.description: String error code indicating what went wrong.

get.description: Return default settings for this Content Understanding resource.

x-ms-error-code.description: String error code indicating what went wrong.

patch.description: Return default settings for this Content Understanding resource.

x-ms-error-code.description: String error code indicating what went wrong.

url.description: The URL of the input to analyze.  Only one of url or data should be specified.

data.description: Base64-encoded binary content of the input to analyze.  Only one of url or data should be specified.

mimeType.description: The MIME type of the input content.  Ex. application/pdf, image/jpeg, etc.

range.description: Range of the input to analyze (ex. `1-3,5,9-`).  Document content uses 1-based page numbers, while audio visual content uses integer milliseconds.

inputs.description: Inputs to analyze.  Currently, only pro mode supports multiple inputs.

modelDeployments.description:
Override default mapping of model names to deployments.
Ex. { "gpt-4.1": "myGpt41Deployment", "text-embedding-3-large": "myTextEmbedding3LargeDeployment" }.

analyzerId.description: The unique identifier of the analyzer.

apiVersion.description: The version of the API used to analyze the document.

createdAt.description: The date and time when the result was created.

warnings.description: Warnings encountered while analyzing the document.

stringEncoding.description:
The string encoding format for content spans in the response.
  Possible values are 'codePoint', 'utf16', and `utf8`.  Default is `codePoint`.")

ArrayField.description: Array field extracted from the content.

AudioVisualContent.description: Audio visual content.  Ex. audio/wav, video/mp4.

startTimeMs.description: Start time of the content in milliseconds.

endTimeMs.description: End time of the content in milliseconds.

width.description: Width of each video frame in pixels, if applicable.

height.description: Height of each video frame in pixels, if applicable.

cameraShotTimesMs.description: List of camera shot changes in the video, represented by its timestamp in milliseconds.  Only if returnDetails is true.

keyFrameTimesMs.description: List of key frames in the video, represented by its timestamp in milliseconds.  Only if returnDetails is true.

transcriptPhrases.description: List of transcript phrases.  Only if returnDetails is true.

segments.description: List of detected content segments.  Only if enableSegment is true.

span.description: Span of the segment in the markdown content.

startTimeMs.description: Start time of the segment in milliseconds.

endTimeMs.description: End time of the segment in milliseconds.

code.description: One of a server-defined set of error codes.

message.description: A human-readable representation of the error.

details.description: An array of details about specific errors that led to this reported error.

innererror.description: An object containing more specific information than the current object about the error.

Azure.Core.Foundations.InnerError.description: An object containing more specific information about the error. As per Azure REST API guidelines - https://aka.ms/AzureRestApiGuidelines#handling-errors.

code.description: One of a server-defined set of error codes.

values.name: NotStarted
values.description: The operation has not started.

values.name: Running
values.description: The operation is in progress.

values.name: Succeeded
values.description: The operation has completed successfully.

values.name: Failed
values.description: The operation has failed.

values.name: Canceled
values.description: The operation has been canceled by the user.

BooleanField.description: Boolean field extracted from the content.

ContentAnalyzer.description: Analyzer that extracts content and fields from multimodal documents.

analyzerId.description: The unique identifier of the analyzer.

createdAt.description: The date and time when the analyzer was created.

lastModifiedAt.description: The date and time when the analyzer was last modified.

warnings.description: Warnings encountered while creating the analyzer.

baseAnalyzerId.description: The analyzer to incrementally train from.

fieldSchema.description: The schema of fields to extracted.

dynamicFieldSchema.description: Indicates whether the result may contain additional fields outside of the defined schema.

processingLocation.description: The location where the data may be processed.  Defaults to global.

values.name: geography
values.description: Data may be processed in the same geography as the resource.

values.name: dataZone
values.description: Data may be processed in the same data zone as the resource.

values.name: global
values.description: Data may be processed in any Azure data center globally.

knowledgeSources.description: Additional knowledge sources used to enhance the analyzer.

models.description:
Mapping of model roles to specific model names.
Ex. { "completion": "gpt-4.1", "embedding": "text-embedding-3-large" }.

supportedModels.description: Chat completion and embedding models supported by the analyzer.

ContentAnalyzerAnalyzeOperationStatus.description: Provides status details for analyze operations.

id.description: The unique ID of the operation.

error.description: Error object that describes the error when status is "Failed".

usage.description: Usage details of the analyze operation.

locales.description: List of locale hints for speech transcription.

enableFigureAnalysis.description: Enable analysis of figures, such as charts and diagrams.

tableFormat.description: Representation format of tables in analyze result markdown.

values.name: html
values.description: Represent tables using HTML table elements: \<table>, \<th>, \<tr>, \<td>.

values.name: markdown
values.description: Represent tables using GitHub Flavored Markdown table syntax, which does not support merged cells or rich headers.

chartFormat.description: Representation format of charts in analyze result markdown.

values.name: chartJs
values.description: Represent charts as Chart.js code blocks.

values.name: markdown
values.description: Represent charts as markdown tables.

annotationFormat.description: Representation format of annotations in analyze result markdown.

values.name: none
values.description: Do not represent annotations.

values.name: markdown
values.description: Represent basic annotation information using markdown formatting.

disableFaceBlurring.description: Disable the default blurring of faces for privacy while processing the content.

estimateFieldSourceAndConfidence.description: Return field grounding source and confidence.

contentCategories.description: Map of categories to classify the input content(s) against.

enableSegment.description: Enable segmentation of the input by contentCategories.

segmentPerPage.description: Force segmentation of document content by page.

omitContent.description:
Omit the content for this analyzer from analyze result.
Only return content(s) from additional analyzers specified in contentCategories, if any.

ContentAnalyzerOperationStatus.description: Provides status details for analyzer creation operations.

id.description: The unique ID of the operation.

error.description: Error object that describes the error when status is "Failed".

usage.description: Usage details of the analyzer creation operation.

values.name: creating
values.description: The resource is being created.

values.name: ready
values.description: The resource is ready.

values.name: deleting
values.description: The resource is being deleted.

values.name: failed
values.description: The resource failed during creation.

ContentAnalyzerUpdate.description: Analyzer that extracts content and fields from multimodal documents.

analyzerId.description: Optional analyzer used to process the content.

analyzer.description: Optional inline definition of analyzer used to process the content.

type.description: Semantic data type of the field value.

spans.description: Span(s) associated with the field value in the markdown content.

confidence.description: Confidence of predicting the field value.

source.description: Encoded source that identifies the position of the field value in the content.

ContentFieldDefinition.description: Definition of the field using a JSON Schema like syntax.

type.description: Semantic data type of the field value.

items.description: Field type schema of each array element, if type is array.

properties.description: Named sub-fields, if type is object.

ContentFieldSchema.description: Schema of fields to be extracted from documents.

name.description: The name of the field schema.

description.description: A description of the field schema.

fields.description: The fields defined in the schema.

definitions.description: Additional definitions referenced by the fields in the schema.

ContentFieldType.description: Semantic data type of the field value.

values.name: string
values.description: Plain text.

values.name: date
values.description: Date, normalized to ISO 8601 (YYYY-MM-DD) format.

values.name: time
values.description: Time, normalized to ISO 8601 (hh:mm:ss) format.

values.name: number
values.description: Number as double precision floating point.

values.name: integer
values.description: Integer as 64-bit signed integer.

values.name: boolean
values.description: Boolean value.

values.name: array
values.description: List of subfields of the same type.

values.name: object
values.description: Named list of subfields.

values.name: json
values.description: JSON object.

ContentSpan.description: Position of the element in markdown, specified as a character offset and length.

offset.description: Starting position (0-indexed) of the element in markdown, specified in characters.

length.description: Length of the element in markdown, specified in characters.

ContentUnderstandingDefaults.description: default settings for this Content Understanding resource.

modelDeployments.description:
Mapping of model names to deployments.
Ex. { "gpt-4.1": "myGpt41Deployment", "text-embedding-3-large": "myTextEmbedding3LargeDeployment" }.

ContentUnderstandingDefaultsMergePatchUp.description: default settings for this Content Understanding resource.

modelDeployments.description:
Mapping of model names to deployments.
Ex. { "gpt-4.1": "myGpt41Deployment", "text-embedding-3-large": "myTextEmbedding3LargeDeployment" }.

CopyAuthorization.description: Copy authorization details for cross-resource copy.

source.description: Full path of the source analyzer.

targetAzureResourceId.description: Azure resource ID of the target location to copy to.

expiresAt.description: Date/time when the copy authorization expires.

sourceAzureResourceId.description: Azure resource ID of the source analyzer location.  Defaults to the current resource.

sourceRegion.description: Azure region of the source analyzer location.  Defaults to current region.

DateField.description: Date field extracted from the content.

valueDate.description: Date field value, in ISO 8601 (YYYY-MM-DD) format.

DocumentAnnotation.description: Annotation in a document, such as a strikethrough or a comment.

spans.description: Spans of the content associated with the annotation.

createdAt.description: Date and time when the annotation was created.

lastModifiedAt.description: Date and time when the annotation was last modified.

DocumentAnnotationComment.description: Comment associated with a document annotation.

createdAt.description: Date and time when the comment was created.

lastModifiedAt.description: Date and time when the comment was last modified.

values.name: highlight
values.description: Highlight annotation.

values.name: strikethrough
values.description: Strikethrough annotation.

values.name: underline
values.description: Underline annotation.

values.name: italic
values.description: Italic annotation.

values.name: bold
values.description: Bold annotation.

values.name: circle
values.description: Circle annotation.

values.name: note
values.description: Note annotation.

source.description: Encoded source that identifies the position of the barcode in the content.

span.description: Span of the barcode in the markdown content.

values.name: QRCode
values.description: QR code, as defined in ISO/IEC 18004:2015.

values.name: PDF417
values.description: PDF417, as defined in ISO 15438.

values.name: UPCA
values.description: GS1 12-digit Universal Product Code.

values.name: UPCE
values.description: GS1 6-digit Universal Product Code.

values.name: Code39
values.description: Code 39 barcode, as defined in ISO/IEC 16388:2007.

values.name: Code128
values.description: Code 128 barcode, as defined in ISO/IEC 15417:2007.

values.name: EAN8
values.description: GS1 8-digit International Article Number (European Article Number).

values.name: EAN13
values.description: GS1 13-digit International Article Number (European Article Number).

values.name: DataBar
values.description: GS1 DataBar barcode.

values.name: Code93
values.description: Code 93 barcode, as defined in ANSI/AIM BC5-1995.

values.name: Codabar
values.description: Codabar barcode, as defined in ANSI/AIM BC3-1995.

values.name: DataBarExpanded
values.description: GS1 DataBar Expanded barcode.

values.name: ITF
values.description: Interleaved 2 of 5 barcode, as defined in ANSI/AIM BC2-1995.

values.name: MicroQRCode
values.description: Micro QR code, as defined in ISO/IEC 23941:2022.

values.name: Aztec
values.description: Aztec code, as defined in ISO/IEC 24778:2008.

values.name: DataMatrix
values.description: Data matrix code, as defined in ISO/IEC 16022:2006.

values.name: MaxiCode
values.description: MaxiCode, as defined in ISO/IEC 16023:2000.

DocumentCaption.description: Caption of a table or figure.

source.description: Encoded source that identifies the position of the caption in the content.

span.description: Span of the caption in the markdown content.

DocumentChartFigure.description: Figure containing a chart, such as a bar chart, line chart, or pie chart.

DocumentContent.description: Document content.  Ex. text/plain, application/pdf, image/jpeg.

startPageNumber.description: Start page number (1-indexed) of the content.

endPageNumber.description: End page number (1-indexed) of the content.

unit.description:
Length unit used by the width, height, and source properties.
For images/tiff, the default unit is pixel.  For PDF, the default unit is inch.

pages.description: List of pages in the document.

paragraphs.description: List of paragraphs in the document.  Only if enableOcr and returnDetails are true.

sections.description: List of sections in the document.  Only if enableLayout and returnDetails are true.

tables.description: List of tables in the document.  Only if enableLayout and returnDetails are true.

figures.description: List of figures in the document.  Only if enableLayout and returnDetails are true.

annotations.description: List of annotations in the document.  Only if enableAnnotations and returnDetails are true.

hyperlinks.description: List of hyperlinks in the document.  Only if returnDetails are true.

segments.description: List of detected content segments.  Only if enableSegment is true.

span.description: Span of the segment in the markdown content.

startPageNumber.description: Start page number (1-indexed) of the segment.

endPageNumber.description: End page number (1-indexed) of the segment.

DocumentElement.description:
JSON pointer referencing an element of the document, such as paragraph,
table, section, etc.

values.name: unknown
values.description: Unknown figure kind.

values.name: chart
values.description: Figure containing a chart, such as a bar chart, line chart, or pie chart.

values.name: mermaid
values.description: Figure containing a diagram, such as a flowchart or network diagram.

source.description: Encoded source that identifies the position of the figure in the content.

span.description: Span of the figure in the markdown content.

elements.description: Child elements of the figure, excluding any caption or footnotes.

DocumentFootnote.description: Footnote of a table or figure.

source.description: Encoded source that identifies the position of the footnote in the content.

span.description: Span of the footnote in the markdown content.

source.description: Encoded source that identifies the position of the formula in the content.

span.description: Span of the formula in the markdown content.

values.name: inline
values.description: A formula embedded within the content of a paragraph.

values.name: display
values.description: A formula in display mode that takes up an entire line.

DocumentHyperlink.description: Hyperlink in a document, such as a link to a web page or an email address.

span.description: Span of the hyperlink in the markdown content.

DocumentLine.description: Line in a document, consisting of an contiguous sequence of words.

source.description: Encoded source that identifies the position of the line in the content.

span.description: Span of the line in the markdown content.

DocumentMermaidFigure.description: Figure containing a diagram, such as a flowchart or network diagram.

spans.description: Span(s) associated with the page in the markdown content.

angle.description:
The general orientation of the content in clockwise direction,
measured in degrees between (-180, 180].
Only if enableOcr is true.

words.description: List of words in the page.  Only if enableOcr and returnDetails are true.

lines.description: List of lines in the page.  Only if enableOcr and returnDetails are true.

barcodes.description: List of barcodes in the page.  Only if enableBarcode and returnDetails are true.

formulas.description: List of mathematical formulas in the page.  Only if enableFormula and returnDetails are true.

DocumentParagraph.description:
Paragraph in a document, generally consisting of an contiguous sequence of lines
with common alignment and spacing.

source.description: Encoded source that identifies the position of the paragraph in the content.

span.description: Span of the paragraph in the markdown content.
Span of the section in the markdown content.

DocumentTable.description: Table in a document, consisting table cells arranged in a rectangular layout.

rowCount.description: Number of rows in the table.

columnCount.description: Number of columns in the table.

source.description: Encoded source that identifies the position of the table in the content.

span.description: Span of the table in the markdown content.

DocumentTableCell.description: Table cell in a document table.

values.name: content
values.description: Main content/data.

values.name: rowHeader
values.description: Description of the row content.

values.name: columnHeader
values.description: Description the column content.

values.name: stubHead
values.description: Description of the row headers, usually located at the top left corner of a table.

values.name: description
values.description: Description of the content in (parts of) the table.

rowSpan.description: Number of rows spanned by this cell.

columnSpan.description: Number of columns spanned by this cell.

source.description: Encoded source that identifies the position of the table cell in the content.

span.description: Span of the table cell in the markdown content.

elements.description: Child elements of the table cell.

DocumentWord.description:
Word in a document, consisting of a contiguous sequence of characters.
For non-space delimited languages, such as Chinese, Japanese, and Korean, 
each character is represented as its own word.

source.description: Encoded source that identifies the position of the word in the content.

span.description: Span of the word in the markdown content.

values.name: generate
values.description: Values are generated freely based on the content.

values.name: extract
values.description: Values are extracted as they appear in the content.

values.name: classify
values.description: Values are classified against a predefined set of categories.

targetAzureResourceId.description: Azure resource ID of the target analyzer location.

targetRegion.description: Azure region of the target analyzer location.  Defaults to current region.

IntegerField.description: Integer field extracted from the content.

JsonField.description: JSON field extracted from the content.

values.name: labeledData
values.description: A labeled data knowledge source.

containerUrl.description: The URL of the blob container containing labeled data.

prefix.description: An optional prefix to filter blobs within the container.

fileListPath.description: An optional path to a file listing specific blobs to include.

LengthUnit.description: Length unit used by the width, height, and source properties.

values.name: pixel
values.description: Pixel unit.

values.name: inch
values.description: Inch unit.

mimeType.description: Detected MIME type of the content.  Ex. application/pdf, image/jpeg, etc.

analyzerId.description: The analyzer that generated this content.

path.description: The path of the content in the input.

values.name: document
values.description: Document content, such as pdf, image, txt, etc.

values.name: audioVisual
values.description: Audio visual content, such as mp3, mp4, etc.

NumberField.description: Number field extracted from the content.

ObjectField.description: Object field extracted from the content.

value.description: The ContentAnalyzer items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

RangeExpression.description:
Range expression for specifying parts of the input to analyze (ex. `1-3,5,9-`).
  Document content uses 1-based page numbers, while audio visual content uses integer milliseconds.

values.name: pageHeader
values.description: Text near the top edge of the page.

values.name: pageFooter
values.description: Text near the bottom edge of the page.

values.name: pageNumber
values.description: Page number.

values.name: title
values.description: Top-level title describing the entire document.

values.name: sectionHeading
values.description: Sub heading describing a section of the document.

values.name: footnote
values.description: Note usually placed after the main content on a page.

values.name: formulaBlock
values.description: Block of formulas, often with shared alignment.

SourceExpression.description: Encoded string expression that describes positions in the content.

StringField.description: String field extracted from the content.

SupportedModels.description: Chat completion and embedding models supported by the analyzer.

completion.description: Chat completion models supported by the analyzer.

embedding.description: Embedding models supported by the analyzer.

TimeField.description: Time field extracted from the content.

valueTime.description: Time field value, in ISO 8601 (hh:mm:ss) format.

startTimeMs.description: Start time of the phrase in milliseconds.

endTimeMs.description: End time of the phrase in milliseconds.

locale.description: Detected locale of the phrase.  Ex. en-US.

span.description: Span of the phrase in the markdown content.

words.description: List of words in the phrase.

startTimeMs.description: Start time of the word in milliseconds.

endTimeMs.description: End time of the word in milliseconds.

span.description: Span of the word in the markdown content.

documentPagesMinimal.description:
The number of document pages processed at the minimal level.
For documents without explicit pages (ex. txt, html), every 3000 UTF-16 characters is counted as one page.

documentPagesBasic.description:
The number of document pages processed at the basic level.
For documents without explicit pages (ex. txt, html), every 3000 UTF-16 characters is counted as one page.

documentPagesStandard.description:
The number of document pages processed at the standard level.
For documents without explicit pages (ex. txt, html), every 3000 UTF-16 characters is counted as one page.

contextualizationTokens.description: The number of contextualization tokens consumed for preparing context, generating confidence scores, source grounding, and output formatting.

tokens.description: The number of LLM and embedding tokens consumed, grouped by model (ex. GTP 4.1) and type (ex. input, cached input, output).

AnalyzeBinaryRequest.input.name: input
AnalyzeBinaryRequest.input.description: The binary content of the document to analyze.

AnalyzeBinaryRequest.range.name: range
AnalyzeBinaryRequest.range.description: Range of the input to analyze (ex. `1-3,5,9-`).  Document content uses 1-based page numbers, while audio visual content uses integer milliseconds.

AnalyzeParameters.processingLocation.name: processingLocation
AnalyzeParameters.processingLocation.description: The location where the data may be processed.  Defaults to global.

values.name: geography
values.description: Data may be processed in the same geography as the resource.

values.name: dataZone
values.description: Data may be processed in the same data zone as the resource.

values.name: global
values.description: Data may be processed in any Azure data center globally.

AnalyzeParameters.stringEncoding.name: stringEncoding
AnalyzeParameters.stringEncoding.description:
The string encoding format for content spans in the response.
  Possible values are 'codePoint', 'utf16', and `utf8`.  Default is `codePoint`.")

Azure.Core.ClientRequestIdHeader.name: x-ms-client-request-id
Azure.Core.ClientRequestIdHeader.description: An opaque, globally-unique, client-generated string identifier for the request.

Azure.Core.Foundations.ApiVersionParamet.name: api-version
Azure.Core.Foundations.ApiVersionParamet.description: The API version to use for this operation.
